Public Data Connectors¶

Product/App Reviews¶

+iOS Store Reviews +Google Play Store Reviews +Home Depot Product Reviews +Lowes Product Reviews +Best Buy Product Reviews +Wal-Mart Product Reviews +Etsy Shop Reviews +Etsy Product Reviews +Amazon Product Reviews

Social Media¶

+Twitter (with twitter account credentials) +Facebook (with facebook account credentials) +Weibo search +Youku +YouTube Comments

Customer/HR Feedback¶

+Consumer Financial Protection Bureau +Indeed +Consumer Affairs
